title: Thanjavooru Mannu Eduthu Lyrics Porkkaalam
stanzas: <div>Thanjavooru Mannu Eduthu Lyrics Porkkaalam

Thanjavuru mannu eduthu
thamarabarani thanniya vittu

Thanjavuru mannu eduthu
thamarabarani thanniya vittu
serthu serthu senjathindha bomma
idhu bomma illa bomma illa unmai

eththanaiyo bomma
senjen kannamaa(2)
adi aththanaiyum
unnapola minnumaa
padhil sollammaa.

thanthaaney thanthaaney
thanthaana kuyile
saami thanthaaney thanthaaney
ennoda mayile.(2)

mookku senja
mannu adhu moonaaru.
pattu kannam senja
mannu adhu ponnooru.

kadhu senja mannu
adhu maelooru.
ava udhadu senja
mannu mattum thaenooru.

karuppu koondhal senjadhu
karisa patti mannunga.
thanga kazhuthu senjathu
sangagiri mannunga.

vaayazhagu senjathellaam
vaigai aaththu mannunga.
pallazhagu senjathu
mullaiyooru mannunga.

neththi seiyum mannukku
suththi suththi vandhenga
nilavil manneduthu
neththi senjen paarunga.

thanthaaney thanthaaney
thanthaana kuyile
saami thanthaaney thanthaaney
ennoda mayile.(2)

Thanjavuru mannu eduthu
thamarabarani thanniya vittu
serthu serthu senjathindha bomma
idhu bomma illa bomma illa unmai

thangavayal manneduthen
tholukku.
naan thamarapadi manneduthen
thanathukku.

vazhaiyoothi manneduthen
vayiththukku.
ada kanjanooru manneduthen
iduppukku.

kanjipuram veedhiyila
manneduthen kaigalukku.
srirangam manneduthen
chinna ponnu viralukku.

pattu kottai oadaiyila
manneduthen kaalukku.
paanjaalam kurichiyila
manneduthen nagathukku.

oorellaam manneduthu
uruvam thandhen udambukku.
en usura naan koduthu
usuru thandhen kannukku.

thanthaaney thanthaaney
thanthaana kuyile
saami thanthaaney thanthaaney
ennoda mayile.

podey..
Thanjavuru mannu eduthu
thamarabarani thanniya vittu
serthu serthu senjathindha bomma
idhu bomma illa bomma illa unmai

eththanaiyo bomma
senjen kannamaa(2)
adi aththanaiyum
unnapola minnumaa
padhil sollammaa.

thanthaaney thanthaaney
thanthaana kuyile
saami thanthaaney thanthaaney
ennoda mayile.(2)
